gmcm.ThrowKey.name: ThrowKey
gmcm.ThrowKey.tooltip: Hold this key when interacting with a farm animal to toss it instead of opening the animal query menu.
gmcm.UseKeyForChildren.name: UseKeyForChildren
gmcm.UseKeyForChildren.tooltip: Require use of the ThrowKey to throw children, instead of automatically proceeding.
gmcm.Blocklist.name: Blocklist
gmcm.Blocklist.tooltip: Specify animal types (e.g. 'White Cow'), or child types ('Crawler' or 'Toddler'), comma-separated, to prevent being able to toss loved ones of those types.
